measurement_conditions: Cold start on machine with SSD meeting recommended specs.
improvement_opportunities: Review DI container registrations; defer loading of non-critical components.
business_relevance: First impression of the application's responsiveness.

measurement_conditions: Time from study selection to first preview render for a 500MB study.
improvement_opportunities: Optimize low-resolution image generation; improve async loading pipeline.
business_relevance: Core clinical workflow efficiency; user satisfaction.

measurement_conditions: Sustained load from 10 concurrent DICOM SCU clients.
load_profile: 10 concurrent storescu processes sending unique studies.
monitoring_tools: JMeter (custom protocol), Windows Performance Monitor, RabbitMQ management UI.
improvement_opportunities: Tune fo-dicom buffer sizes; optimize message publishing.
business_relevance: Ensures system can handle load from a busy clinical environment without dropping data.
